subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar officials Tuesday issued severe penalties to Dale Earnhardt Jr., his race team and his crew chief after his car failed an inspection before a Nextel Cup race last weekend.
snippet: Nascar officials Tuesday issued severe penalties to Dale Earnhardt Jr., his race team and his crew chief after his car failed an inspection before a Nextel Cup race last weekend.
